overview: An M-Tech final year student Janhavi is in an intimate relationship for four years along with her boyfriend Sameer, the semister is about to finish and so is the time for the couple to half methods as Janhavi has to now return to her house city and stay along with her mom who’s a single mother or father and a lawyer by occupation on the Excessive Courtroom, the story takes a flip when Sameer asks Janhavi to introduce him to her mom and speak to her about their relationship, nonetheless, the twist unfolds when Janhavi’s mom has some crafty plans to meet her hidden fantasies after assembly Sameer. Will Janhavi and Sameer get married or will Janhavi’s mom achieve her evil wishes. Watch to seek out out.
title: Love Duo
